Image EQ

Gradient Big Chunks Little Chunks Clarity Structure Sharpening Crispness Not Much

This is still a work in progress, my final plan is to have an EQ style graph with controllable points in order to push/pull certain frequencies in the image. This feature isn't available in any major software so I thought I would develop it myself.

This uses a modified version of Kevin Kwok's code for FFT and DCT. It could be made significantly faster by moving the heavy calculations to the GPU or alternatively to WASM.
